In search of

Maintainable Code

A searchable link collection for code reviews

When doing code reviews I find myself referring to a lot of "authoritative" sources for information on design patterns, principles, practices, code smells, etc. To avoid having to paraphrase these sources in my code reviews, I provide links straight to the source itself.

Looking up these sources takes time and requires a mental context switch during the code review. To alleviate this I use a searchable collection of links: http://review.maintainablecode.com.

Feel free to send me a link if you would like to have something added to the collection.
